enb_long_title: Forty-first Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-41)
section_title: IMPLEMENTATION OF THE IPCC ERROR PROTOCOL
sentences: IPCC Secretary Christ introduced the agenda item (IPCC-XLI/Doc.12; IPCC-XLI/Doc.17) on implementation of the IPCC Error Protocol, describing a number of ways that pre and post-publication errata could be reflected online.
The ExComm will further consider this issue and report back to IPCC-42.
